Html:
Hello.

I just discovered this intriguing project. I downloaded and ran the project and it all seems to work!

However, I am not entirely sure how to extend it with my own plugins...

Your "How-Tos" for the following appear to be blank:
  • Create an Activity
  • Create a HealthCheck
  • Create a Publisher
  • Create a Scheduler
  • Add pages to the Web UI
  • Extend the Web Api
Any progress on this?

-dennis

Hi Dennis.

The project (& documentation) certainly alive but best described as "hibernating"! Basically between current work and home commitments there isn't a great deal of time to devote to Wolfpack including the docs. I am planning to start work on it again this summer and have a blast through all the outstanding tasks including the docs but unfortunately not just yet.

However...I think that you can probably work out how to build health checks, activities and publishers by taking apart a couple of the contrib plugins... the Growl publisher and Rabbit check would be a good place to start (source for all on contrib codeplex site).

If there are any specific questions or you hit a problem then let me know and I should be able to help you out.

regards,
James
